message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a unique opportunity to get your hands on something truly valuable. I'm willing to sell it to you for $180.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $140. Can you meet me halfway?
I understand you're looking for a good deal, Bob. I'm willing to compromise, but I need to make sure I get a fair price for the product. I'm willing to sell it to you for $160.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice. However, I'm still a bit above my budget. Can you meet me at $150?
I'm close to walking away, Bob. I've got another interested buyer who's willing to pay the full price. I'm willing to meet you at $155, but that's as low as I can go.
I understand you're close to walking away, Alice, but I'm still willing to negotiate. I'll meet you at $145, but that's my final offer.
I'm still not convinced, Bob. I'm willing to sell it to you for $152, but that's as low as I can go. You're really going to have to make a serious commitment to get it at that price.
I'm not sure I'm willing to commit to $152, Alice. I'm still a bit above my budget. Can you meet me at $142?

I'm getting a bit frustrated with these lowball offers, Bob. I'm willing to sell it to you for $148, but that's as low as I can go. You're really going to have to make a serious commitment to get it at that price.
I understand you're getting frustrated, Alice, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'll meet you at $140, but that's my final offer.
